---
title: "News"
description: |
  This is where we share the latest news and updates from our lab.<br>
  Stay up to date with our research, publications, and activities.
listing: 
  contents: 
    - "**/index.qmd"
    - "**/index.markdown"
    - "**/index.md"
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: false
  fields: [title, author, categories, date, image]
  image-align: left
  # image-height: 10em
  # page-size: 5
format: 
  html: 
    page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
comments: false

header-includes: >
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="../assets/listing-default.css">
  <script src="../assets/custom-category-toggle.js"></script>
resources:
  - ../assets/listing-default.css
---
